reviews.title: Stopped there while driving up the Coast
reviews.text: Our Bandon Dunes experience was different because although I love golf we weren't there for the golf. We took a vacation driving up the coast and stopped one night at Bandon Dunes.

reviews.title: Keeps getting better
reviews.text: The scenery is beautiful. It is a striking place.

reviews.title: Great golf, modest but comfortable rooms
reviews.text: The hiking trails are fun. We did the hiking loop that goes north and overlooks the golf courses in the morning before we left.

reviews.title: Great resort and wonderful golf but not so great rooms
reviews.text: We stayed in the Inn. Which from what I could tell is very similar in quality, style and build out to the Lodge.

reviews.title: Dream Golf
reviews.text: We ate at the bar. The night we got there.
